flawed_nl_solution:
He knows 800*0.2=<<800*0.2=160.0>>160.0 words
So he needs to learn 800-160.0=<<800-160.0=640.0>>640.0 words
That means he needs to learn 640.0/40=<<640.0/40=61.0>>61.0 words per day

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 16.0, not 61.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
